title: Taylor Swift’s Smash ‘Midnights’ Sells More Than 1 Million in a Week
description: The singer-songwriter’s latest album is a blockbuster, debuting with the biggest weekly total for any LP since Adele’s “25” in 2015.
dc:creator: Ben Sisario
media:description: The last record to sell one million copies in a week was Taylor Swift’s “Reputation,” in 2017.
